page.description: Foreign language support for labels and instructions in web apps is built in. International characters are supported for the DATA (UTF8 is the technical term.)

section.description: Web apps can be designed to support virtually any language, using that language's characters. Here's an example of an app using Chinese characters.
If you are building Codeless AJAX (TM) Web applications against SQL databases in Alpha Anywhere - you will be able to serve people worldwide with the data in their native tongue.
